verses.text: Afterward he brought me again to the door of the house; and behold, waters issued out from under the threshhold of the house eastward: for the front of the house \add stood towards\add* the east, and the waters came down from under from the right side of the house, at the south \add side\add* of the altar.
Then he brought me out of the way of the gate northward, and led me about the way without to the outer gate by the way that looketh eastward; and behold, there ran out waters on the right side.
And when the man that had the line in his hand went forth eastward, he measured a thousand cubits, and he brought me through the waters; the waters \add were\add* to the ankles.
Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through the waters; the waters \add were\add* to the knees. Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through; the waters \add were\add* to the loins.
Afterward he measured a thousand; \add and it was\add* a river that I could not pass over: for the waters had risen, waters to swim in, a river that could not be passed over.
And he said to me, Son of man, hast thou seen \add this\add* ? Then he brought me, and caused me to return to the brink of the river.
Now when I had returned, behold, at the bank of the river \add were\add* very many trees on the one side and on the other.
Then said he to me, These waters issue out towards the east country, and go down into the desert, and go into the sea: \add which being\add* brought forth into the sea, the waters shall be healed.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* every thing that liveth, which moveth, whithersoever the rivers shall come, shall live: and there shall be a very great multitude of fish, because these waters shall come thither: for they shall be healed; and every thing shall live whither the river cometh.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the fishers shall stand upon it from En-gedi even to En-eglaim; they shall be a \add place\add* to spread forth nets; their fish shall be according to their kinds, as the fish of the great sea, very numerous.
But its miry places and its marshes shall not be healed; they shall be given to salt.

And by the river upon its bank, on this side and on that side, shall grow all trees for food, whose leaf shall not fade, neither shall its fruit be consumed: it shall bring forth new fruit according to its months, because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary: and its fruit shall be for food, and its leaf for medicine.
Thus saith the Lord GOD; This \add shall be\add* the border, by which ye shall inherit the land according to the twelve tribes of Israel: Joseph \add shall have two\add* portions.
And ye shall inherit it, one as well as another: \add concerning\add* which I lifted up my hand to give it to your fathers: and this land shall fall to you for inheritance.
And this \add shall be\add* the border of the land towards the north side, from the great sea, the way of Hethlon, as men go to Zedad;
Hamath, Berothah, Sibraim, which \add is\add* between the border of Damascus and the border of Hamath; Hazar-hatticon, which \add is\add* by the border of Hauran.
And the border from the sea shall be Hazar-enan, the border of Damascus, and the north northward, and the border of Hamath. And \add this is\add* the north side.

And the east side ye shall measure from Hauran, and from Damascus, and from Gilead, and from the land of Israel \add by\add* Jordan, from the border to the east sea. And \add this is\add* the east side.
And the south side southward, from Tamar \add even\add* to the waters of strife \add in\add* Kadesh, the river to the great sea. And \add this is\add* the south side southward.
The west side also \add shall be\add* the great sea from the border, till a man cometh over against Hamath. This \add is\add* the west side.
So shall ye divide this land to you according to the tribes of Israel.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance to you, and to the strangers that sojourn among you, which shall beget children among you: and they shall be to you as born in the country among the children of Israel; they shall have inheritance with you among the tribes of Israel.
And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in what tribe the stranger sojourneth, there shall ye give \add him\add* his inheritance, saith the Lord GOD.
